mapper.insert: insert into user( user_name, user_nickname, user_id, user_password, user_email, user_phone ) values( #{user_name}, #{user_nickname}, #{user_id}, #{user_password}, #{user_email}, #{user_phone} )
mapper.update: update user set user_password=#{user_password} where user_id=#{user_id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from user where user_idx=#{user_idx}
select * from user where user_name=#{user_name} and user_phone=#{user_phone}
select * from user where user_id=#{user_id} and user_phone=#{user_phone}
select user_id, user_password from user where user_id=#{user_id} and user_password=#{user_password}
